long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of sitting on video calls all day but feel chained to your desk because that's where your work tools are? We know the feeling. Try out Spot, the audio-only meeting platform built to move with you, so you can bring your tools wherever you go. Transcribe your conversations, take notes, assign tasks, and donâ€™t feel guilty for leaving your desk.

With the Spot Scheduler, easily add Spot calls to your events directly from Google Calendar.
